body:
## Release Notes

- Correct mergeable check for commit messages. @iphydf (#35)
- Also require semantic release conventions on commits. @iphydf (#34)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#33)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#32)
- Remove titlelint from the required checks. @iphydf (#18)
- Add some conventional commits labels (chore, refactor, ...). @iphydf (#16)
- Update README.md for the .github repo after the rename. @iphydf (#15)
- Enable issues on all repos by default. @iphydf (#13)
- Rename "template" repo to ".github". @iphydf (#14)
- Remove "-" from "code-cleanup" tag. @iphydf (#12)
- All our repos are related to tox, but not to toxcore. @iphydf (#11)
- Add push access for admins. @iphydf (#10)
- Restrictions needs empty lists for apps/users. @iphydf (#9)
- Restrict master pushes to reviewers. @iphydf (#8)
- Pull must work for admins... @iphydf (#7)
- Let's try giving triage access to admins. @iphydf (#6)
- Add "push" access for automation users. @iphydf (#5)
- Add "maintain" access to all repos for admins. @iphydf (#4)
- Use normal github labels. @iphydf (#3)
- Remove all requirements on checks passing in the base template repo. @iphydf (#2)
- Require reviewable to pass on all repos. @iphydf (#1)

## Features

- Add an invalid label to make sorting out undesirable PRs easier @robinlinden (#24)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add size labels for issues. @iphydf (#30)
- Fix conversation resolution requirement @robinlinden (#29)
- Require conversations to be resolved before merge @robinlinden (#28)
- Make CLA globally optional. @iphydf (#27)
- Remove emojis from release-drafter changelog. @iphydf (#26)
- Remove some status checks we don't need. @iphydf (#25)
- We need a space after the "fix:" etc. @iphydf (#23)
- Exempt dependabot from semantic release conventions. @iphydf (#22)
- Add more labels and use them for categories. @iphydf (#21)
- Allow "cleanup" as a semantic PR tag. @iphydf (#20)
- Add mergeable config for PR title checks. @iphydf (#19)
name: v0.1.0
